tagline: An Rook/Kentucky Discard game for iOS
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Blackbird
body:
### Blackbird
Finally on iOS, you can play this classic trick-taking game.

* Choose between two different rule sets
* Play against the AI

Coming soon...

* Play against your friends online or locally
* Setup customized rule sets to play with
